department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: System Administrator and Technical Architect need.
description: System Administrator, Secret, Ontario, Level 3 \n Technical Architect, Secret, Ontario, Level 3 \n System Administrator, Secret, Ontario, Level 2
full_summary:
#### W3915-230036: TBIPS System Administrator and Technical Architect

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number**: WS4071696110-Doc4083956185
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4071696110
* **Publication Date**: July 4, 2023
* **Closing Date**: August 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023
* **Location**: Kingston, Ontario, Canada

**Scope of Work**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision of System Administrator and Technical Architect services under the Task-and-Condition-Based Innovation Procurement Services (TBIPS) framework. This requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-170432/B who have qualified for Tier 2 and the stated consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise.

**Categories**

* System Administrator, Secret, Ontario, Level 3 (3.I.9)
* Technical Architect, Secret, Ontario, Level 3 (3.I.10)
* System Administrator, Secret, Ontario, Level 2 (3.I.9)

**Procedure**

* Suppliers must submit their bids electronically through Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys by August 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.
* Suppliers must also provide all required supporting documentation and bid submission.

**Trade Agreements**

This project is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

Fraser, Alexa (SPAC/PSPC)
Alexa.fraser@tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16768391?extsite=MTY3N
